document.masterDocTitle: Challenging the Wallacean shortfall: A total assessment of insect diversity on Guadeloupe (French West Indies), a checklist and bibliography

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Challenging the Wallacean shortfall: A total assessment of insect diversity on Guadeloupe (French West Indies), a checklist and bibliography

mods:name.mods:affiliation: Entomology Department, Muséum d’Histoire Naturelle 12 rue Voltaire 44000 Nantes, France
UMS 2006 PatriNat, AFB-CNRS-MNHN 36 rue Geoffroy St Hilaire 75005 Paris, France
